programme.desc: Trevor and his wife are no strangers to reality television. But Trevor says she's taken things too far.

programme.sub-title: To See Your Grandson...Stop Bullying Me

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: I Stopped Cheating; Unlock My Phone To Prove It/ DNA Mystery: Are You My Sister?
programme.desc: Kayla had just come out of a toxic relationship when she met her boyfriend. But she made a big mistake.

programme.sub-title: Unlock the Phone: Is She Still Talking to her One-Night Stand?
programme.desc: Jaylinn wants to unlock Aaron's phone after rumors about him led to cheating, pregnancy and even drug use.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Stop Disappearing in the Middle of the Night
programme.desc: Renee believed her fiancé was everything she dreamed of, until he got a second chance in the music industry.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Told the Baby Wasn't Mine in the Delivery Room; Exes Fight Like Cats Over a Dog
programme.desc: A man finds out he may not be the father of his newly born child; a woman wants joint custody of her ex-boyfriend's dog.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: Our Throuple Trouble; Unlock: Are You on Drugs?
programme.desc: Egypt's boyfriend invited another woman into their relationship, and things got messy; Bryant says Valerie is cheating with his friends, doing drugs, and selling her body to support her habit -- but he may be the one who is unfaithful.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: My Man And Bestie Together? / Unlock: "Nothing Worth Coming Home For"
programme.desc: Much to Malaysia’s dismay, her boyfriend routinely talks to other women on social media. Then, Keiana is constantly fighting with her boyfriend about his cheating ways. He admits to his cheating ways in the past but claims he's an all true man now.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Our Entire Friendship Is A Lie/ Unlock The Phone: You Got Caught!
programme.desc: Victoria is here to set the record straight with Asia. She blames Victoria for the demise of her relationship.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Mom, Why? / Unlock The Phone: Stop Cheating
programme.desc: Kwane needs help her with her mommy issues. She says her mother dealt in drugs, alcohol, and sex work.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Did My Mom Trade Me for Drugs? Part 2
programme.desc: A DNA mystery that has loomed over Lex’s head for far too long gets answered today!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My Cousin Made Me Lose My Baby; Unlock the Phone: Do You Have a Secret, Pregnant Girlfriend?
programme.desc: Tamera's boyfriend is a serial cheater, and she thinks her twin, Tia, is meddlesome and controlling; at age 18, Jarako learned that Akail was his father, but after spending time together, Akail wants to hit pause on things until he gets confirmation.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: You Got My 15 Year Old Pregnant...I'll Prove It Today!
programme.desc: Today on MAURY…Teen mom Jasmine swears that Jeff is her baby’s father. She and her mom Tonya want him to take a DNA test and responsibility! Then, April’s one-night stand with her fiance’s best friend landed her in a paternity jam! Who’s the dad?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: My Secret Is... I Cheated With 9 Women!
programme.desc: What will happen when Megan finds out that boyfriend Patrick cheated on her with 9 women? Is James cheating on his wife Courtney? Find out today!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 1 Man…4 Babies…I'll Prove You're The Dad!
programme.desc: Lashunda has 4 kids, all of which she claims are Kevin's. But Kevin denies all four saying she sleeps around. Then Brittney is shocked to find out that after 2 years Rovert denies their son.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Kidnapped ... Vanished ... Find Our Missing Kids
programme.desc: Their children disappeared, seeming to vanish into thin air. They don't have any evidence or explanation but they're hoping that you might be the person to help them find their missing children.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Saw You In A Sex Video...I'm Not Your Baby's Dad!
programme.desc: Damien swears that he found a video of his fiancee having sex on the internet. Now he's using that little clue as a excuse to deny her baby! Then Regina discovered that her man Justin was cheating when he crashed his car while April was a passenger. Now she says that April has brainwashed him into believing that he's not the father of her child.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: If You Slept With My Mom ... The Wedding Is Off!
programme.desc: Darren finds out an unbelievable secret. Will he be able to handle the truth? Then, Dominique is furious because she says her husband is sleeping with her cousin. Finally, Michelle brought her husband here to reveal a devastating secret.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: These Kids Are Yours ... The DNA Drama Ends Today!
programme.desc: It's DNA dynamite on today's Maury! These denying dads are deadest against taking responsibility for these children! But these mothers are here to prove once and for all that their search for their baby's fathers have come to and end. Don't miss the shocking results!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Top 10 Most Outrageous Guests of 2009
programme.desc: MAURY rings in the new year by counting down his most outrageous guests of 2009.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I've Taken 21 DNA Tests...I'll Prove I'm Not the Dad!
programme.desc: Is Melvin being duped by De’Ja and his sister Sequoia or did he father De’Ja’s baby? Then, is Gary the father of sweet Fantasia? Plus, Walter has taken 2 paternity tests for his girlfriend Renee’s kids!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Maury's Truth Test…Cheating Men Exposed!
programme.desc: These guests simply can't keep their hands to themselves when faced with a tempting situation and find themselves in deep trouble with their partners. Just how much can a person take before they are ready to toss that cheating spouse to the curb?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Secrets! Did My Sister's Fiance Get Me Pregnant!
programme.desc: Richell and Ryan have been together through thick and thin. But their world was turned upside down when Richell's cousin Deanna revealed that she had slept with Ryan and that he might be the father of her 1 year old child.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Souring Her Son
programme.desc: Davonte Collins says his mother, the defendant, illegally signed his name to a lease on an apartment she was living in and still owes rent. Now, he’s on the hook for late fees, back rent, and cleaning fees. Amryl James-Reid says she and her son shared the apartment and she’s outraged he’s taking her to court today. She believes she owes her ungrateful stubborn son nothing but a lesson on respect. He’s suing for $5,000 and she’s accused of souring her son.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Family Feuding Over Rental
programme.desc: Dwayne sues his niece and her husband for $2,570, claiming they damaged his apartment and owe rent. The defendants argue the apartment had lead paint, harmed their child, and they paid in full. They countersue for $3,000 in damages.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Wedding Photo Fiasco
programme.desc: Gloria McPherson sues photographer Aston Watson for $600, claiming he botched her wedding by failing to deliver on services, including a second photographer and an album. Aston defends, blaming her behavior and even her guests' looks.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Karaoke Combustion
programme.desc: John Mahoney sues Jesse Patterson for $600 after faulty wiring at Jesse's bar allegedly fried his karaoke equipment. Jesse denies responsibility, claiming John was subcontracted by another company and the equipment malfunctioned.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Dreadlock Disaster
programme.desc: Chenelle Dawson sues Alcie Shaw for $5,000, claiming a botched dreadlock job caused pain and ruined her hair. Alcie denies wrongdoing, stating she explained her method and the plaintiff never complained.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Help, My 23-Year-Old Bestie Is Drinking Too Much/ Unlock The Phone: Did You Cheat On My Birthday?
programme.desc: Shelby and Brandi are both concerned about their friend Manny’s excessive drinking.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock The Phone Has Shocking Surprise
programme.desc: Karamo dives in to help Kenny and Nichole with their lingering issues after knowing each other for decades.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Cousins at War Over $384
programme.desc: After a night of too much drinking, Ro Ro claims that $384 of her money went MIA.
